<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hidden Paragon](/Feats.aspx?ID=599) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 189 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

**Trigger**
You successfully use Stealth to Hide and become hidden from all of your current foes, or use Stealth to Sneak and become undetected to all your current foes.

</column>

---

When you put your mind to slipping out of sight, you disappear completely. You become [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) for 1 minute, even if you use a [hostile action](/Rules.aspx?ID=300). Not even [_glitterdust_](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), or similar effects can reveal you, though creatures can still use the [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) action to locate you as normal.
name: Hidden Paragon
